protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the reduction of all-trans-retinal to all-trans-retinol in the presence of NADPH.

reference.reference_text: Haeseleer F, Huang J, Lebioda L, Saari JC, Palczewski K: Molecular characterization of a novel short-chain dehydrogenase/reductase that reduces all-trans-retinal. J Biol Chem. 1998 Aug 21;273(34):21790-9.
